issue.title: [Rust] Time and Timestamp Support
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3959](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3959). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I'm currently working on schema inference for the csv reader, but I got stuck while dealing with timestamps. I had a look at the datatypes.rs, and it looks like timestamps aren't supported in Rust.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3959?focusedCommentId=16738821) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3340
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3340>
